body_html:
@mrry thanks. Earlier CuDNN 5.1 files were extracted (include, bin, include) in CUDA desinated path. However, somehow they were not placed properly in designate paths.

Post this discussion thread i recheck lib/files (thoroughly), found they were missing. Now extracted at different location and copied in designated CUDA paths. Problem is resolved.

Thanks all friends for extending their support !!

Regards, Rajeev Sharma

body:
@mrry thanks. Earlier CuDNN 5.1 files were extracted (include, bin, include) in CUDA desinated path. However, somehow they were not placed properly in designate paths. 

Post this discussion thread i recheck lib/files (thoroughly), found they were missing. Now extracted at different location and copied in designated CUDA paths. Problem is resolved. 

Thanks all friends for extending their support !!

Regards, Rajeev Sharma
